msg.enterUsername: Enter the GitHub username of our partner (you can ask them to type it)

github.note: opspark for %s: cli util to install, setup, and grade student projects

help.incomplete:
Whoops, we encountered a slight problem while trying to initialize your portfolio.html file:

We could not find your portfolio.html file. It should be located in the root directory of your website, and it should be called portfolio.html.

If you do not have a portfolio.html file in the root directory of your website, then you have not correctly completed the portfolio lesson of the Operation Spark website project, and you need to do so before moving forward.

Please complete the project tutorial at:

https://github.com/OperationSpark/portfolio/blob/master/README.md

If you need help, please ask one of the Operation Spark instructors, or, ask for help on our Operation Spark Slack chat group.  If you are not a member of this group, please request an invitation by emailing:

admin@operationspark.org

Once you've sorted this out, try again to initialize your portfolio, thanks!
help.noPortfolioList:
Whoops, we can't find an a <ul> with an id of portfolio.

Check your portfolio.html file, and ensure that you have appropriately given your portfolio <ul> the id of portfolio, so that the opening tag looks like <ul id="portfolio">!

Once you do this, save your file and try again to initialize your portfolio, thanks!
help.portfolioScriptTagExists:
Whoops, you are trying to initialize your portfolio.html file, but it appears the portfolio script tag already exists.

Double check your portfolio.html or ask for help.

msg.enterPartnerName: Enter the GitHub username of your partner (you can ask them to type it)
